Class NeuralNetwork

  • java.lang.Object
    • NeuralNetwork

  • public class NeuralNetwork
extends java.lang.Object

    Neural Network Library

    Simple 3-layered neural network with an input layer, a hidden layer, and an output layer
    Since:
    3 November 2018
    Version:
    0.0.1
    Author:
    Bailey Pelletier

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      NeuralNetwork()
      If passed no parameters, this constructor creates a linear neural network
      NeuralNetwork(int input_nodes, int hidden_nodes, int output_nodes)
      Basic constructor for a 3-layered Neural Network

      Creates and initializes Bias vector between hidden and output layers with random values between 0 and 1.

      Creates and initializes Bias vector between input and hidden layers with random values between 0 and 1.

      • predict

        public void predict()

        FeedForward Process

        Using current weights and inputs, calculates hidden layer values and then output layer values

      • predict

        public double[] predict(double[] inputArr)

        FeedForward Process

        Using current weights and user inputs, calculates hidden layer values and then output layer values. Returns output layer as an array.
        Parameters:
        inputArr -
        Returns:
        array of output values

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
